original: @180a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @180a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya parna sha ba ri dh'a ra ni /
analyzed: a'arya parna sha ba ri dh'a ra ni /
translated: Ārya-Parṇaśavarīdhāraṇī

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo ma can gyi gzungs /🔽dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo ma can gyi gzungs / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Noble Leaf-Earring Forest-Dwelling Nun🔽Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
analyzed: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
translated: Homage to Amitābha,

original: ta th'a ga t'a ya /
analyzed: ta th'a ga t'a ya /
translated: the Tathāgata,

original: aarha te sam myaksam buddh'a ya /
analyzed: aarha te sam myaksam buddh'a ya /
translated: the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One.

original: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
analyzed: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
translated: Homage to Noble Avalokiteśvara,

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /🔽ma h'a satv'a ya /🔽ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya / ma h'a satv'a ya / ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
translated: the Bodhisattva,🔽the Great Being,🔽the Greatly Compassionate One.

original: na mo ma h'astha ma pr'apt'a ya /
analyzed: na mo ma h'astha ma pr'apt'a ya /
translated: Homage to the One Who Has Attained the Great Elephant,

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya /
translated: to the Bodhisattva,

original: ma h'a satv'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a satv'a ya /
translated: the Great Being,

original: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /🔽b'a ma ne tv'am na ma shy'a mi b'a ma ne /
analyzed: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya / b'a ma ne tv'am na ma shy'a mi b'a ma ne /
translated: the Greatly Compassionate One.

original: bha ga ba t'i pi sh'a tsi parna sha ba ri pi sh'a tsi p'a sha pa ra shuddha ri ni /
analyzed: bha ga ba t'i pi sh'a tsi parna sha ba ri pi sh'a tsi p'a sha pa ra shuddha ri ni /
translated: The Blessed One's Piśācī Parṇaśavarī, the Piśācī who has purified the noose,🔽the noose.

original: y'a ni k'a ni tsita b'a m'a ni autpa tyante y'a:k'ashtsi ta m'a yo y'a:k'a shtsi d'i ta yo ye ke tsita au pa dra ba ye ke tsita au p'a y'a p'a ye ke tsita dhy'a tmi k'a bha ya /🔽ye ke tsi du pa sarga pa sarga sam bha dhva pa au pa tyante /🔽sarba ni t'a ni sarb'a st'a /🔽sarba de b'a la ta ae botya tyanto na pandi ta ta ta da ne ni sa tyen pa tya na po tya ba tsa ne na na satya ba kye na /🔽dza:dza:dza:dza:ae bhi: pandi ta mantra pa deer ma ma sarba satv'a n'am tsa raksham ku ru pa ri tra nam ku ru pa ri gra ham /
analyzed: y'a ni k'a ni tsita b'a m'a ni autpa tyante y'a:k'ashtsi ta m'a yo y'a:k'a shtsi d'i ta yo ye ke tsita au pa dra ba ye ke tsita au p'a y'a p'a ye ke tsita dhy'a tmi k'a bha ya / ye ke tsi du pa sarga pa sarga sam bha dhva pa au pa tyante / sarba ni t'a ni sarb'a st'a / sarba de b'a la ta ae botya tyanto na pandi ta ta ta da ne ni sa tyen pa tya na po tya ba tsa ne na na satya ba kye na / dza:dza:dza:dza:ae bhi: pandi ta mantra pa deer ma ma sarba satv'a n'am tsa raksham ku ru pa ri tra nam ku ru pa ri gra ham /
translated: Some are born, some are born again, some are born in the womb, some are born from eggs, some are born from moisture, some are born from a combination of causes, some are born from a combination of causes and conditions, some are born from a combination of causes and conditions.

original: ku ru pa ri p'a l'a ni ku ru sh'antim ku ru satya ya nam ku ru danda pa ri h'a ram ku ru sh'astra pa ri h'a ra ku ru y'a ba t'a bi sha nam ku ru aagni pa ri h'a ram ku ru au da ka pa ri
analyzed: ku ru pa ri p'a l'a ni ku ru sh'antim ku ru satya ya nam ku ru danda pa ri h'a ram ku ru sh'astra pa ri h'a ra ku ru y'a ba t'a bi sha nam ku ru aagni pa ri h'a ram ku ru au da ka pa ri

analyzed: h'a ram ku ru k'a khorda da nam ku ru s'i ma bandham ku ru dha ri n'i bandham ku ru /

original: na ma:sarba sha ba ra n'am ma h'a pa sha ba r'a n'am bha ga ba ti pi sh'a tsi barna sha ba ri p'a sh'a r'i sv'a h'a /
analyzed: na ma:sarba sha ba ra n'am ma h'a pa sha ba r'a n'am bha ga ba ti pi sh'a tsi barna sha ba ri p'a sh'a r'i sv'a h'a /
translated: Namaḥ sarva-śavarṇāṃ mahā-paśavaranāṃ bhagavatī piśācī varṇa-śabarī pāśarī svāhā.

original: 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma can gyi gzungs rdzogs so /
